mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EARTHQUAKE_LIVE (EARTHQUAKE_LIVE_SEQ, TP, TM_FC, SEQ, TM_EQK_MSC, MT, LAT, LON, LOC, SCALE, REM, COR) VALUES ((SELECT COALESCE(MAX(E.EARTHQUAKE_LIVE_SEQ),0)+1 FROM EARTHQUAKE_LIVE E), #{tp}, #{tmFc}, #{seq}, #{tmEqkMsc}, #{mt}, #{lat}, #{lon}, #{loc}, #{scale}, #{rem}, #{cor})
mapper.select: SELECT EARTHQUAKE_LIVE_SEQ, TP, TM_FC, SEQ, TM_EQK_MSC, MT, LAT, LON, LOC, SCALE, REM, COR FROM EARTHQUAKE_LIVE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EARTHQUAKE (EARTHQUAKE_SEQ, MSG_CODE, CNT_DIV, AR_DIV, EQ_AR_CD_NM, EQ_PT, NK_DIV, TM_ISSUE, EQ_DATE, MAG_ML, MAG_DIFF, EQ_DT, EQ_LT, EQ_LN, MAJOR_AXIS, MINOR_AXIS, DEPTH_DIFF, JD_LOC, JD_LOC_A, RE_FER) VALUES ((SELECT COALESCE(MAX(E.EARTHQUAKE_SEQ),0)+1 FROM EARTHQUAKE E), #{msgCode}, #{cntDiv}, #{arDiv}, #{eqArCdNm}, #{eqPt}, #{nkDiv}, #{tmIssue}, #{eqDate}, #{magMl}, #{magDiff}, #{eqDt}, #{eqLt}, #{eqLn}, #{majorAxis}, #{minorAxis}, #{depthDiff}, #{jdLoc}, #{jdLocA}, #{ReFer})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT E.EARTHQUAKE_SEQ, E.MAG_CODE, E.CNT_DIV, E.AR_DIV, E.EQ_AR_CD_NM, E.EQ_PT, E.NK_DIV, E.TM_ISSUE, E.EQ_DATE, E.MAG_ML, E.MAG_DIFF, E.EQ_DT, E.EQ_LT, E.EQ_LN, E.MAJOR_AXIS, E.MINOR_AXIS, E.DEPTH_DIFF, E.JD_LOC, E.JD_LOC_A, E.RE_FER -- DATE_FORMAT(N.REG_DT, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') AS REG_DT FROM EARTHQUAKE E ORDER BY E.EARTHQUAKE_SEQ DESC;
